Plot: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.
Title: Igby Goes Down
Actors: Kieran Culkin, Claire Danes, Jeff Goldblum, Jared Harris
tomatoConsensus: In the vein of The Catcher in the Rye, Igby Goes Down is scathingly witty and sharply observant.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 15 nominations.
